WRITING.TEXT: We #8217;ve been dating a little over a year. I #8217;ve brought up the subjects of pet names and him never giving me compliments anymore. It didn #8217;t help and I #8217;m nervous to bring up the other stuff.
I #8217;ve tried talking to him about the pet names and compliments but that #8217;s it.
What #8217;s a love language quiz?
Thanks, I #8217;m going to try it tonight.

WRITING.TITLE: Fuck zyprexa
WRITING.TEXT: My doctor put me on zyprexa last year and I quickly gained about 60 pounds. I #8217;ve never gained weight like that before. I went from being about 120 to almost 180! I stopped taking it but the damage was done. NONE of my clothes fit anymore and I went from being super self confident to hating my appearance and feeling uncomfortable in my own body. I started eating less, cut out soda, and started drinking more water and FINALLY it #8217;s starting to pay off! I went to the doctor the other day and I #8217;ve dropped down to 155! I #8217;m not where I want to be yet but I #8217;m relieved that I #8217;m getting smaller again and can fit into some of my clothes.
I hope we both can! Good luck!
Thank you!
Thanks for the advice. I #8217;m hoping I #8217;ll be able to wear my old jeans again come winter!
Ugh I know exactly what you mean!
I just can #8217;t get over my doctor prescribing it to me without so much as mentioning all the TERRIBLE side effects. It blows my mind...
Amen! So sorry about your loss!

I think everyone should be aware of the negative side effects of medications PRIOR to taking them. This drug also causes diabetes, which several here have confirmed getting as a result of their use of it. I didn #8217;t get it but it scares me to think I could have had I continued. Diabetes is another SERIOUS disease. The depression and worthlessness I #8217;ve come to deal with as a result of the weight gain are NOT cohesive with maintaining a healthy/stable lifestyle! I #8217;m glad I could warn others to be wary of this specific medication by sharing my awful experience and I wish I had fully understood the risk prior to taking it myself. I could have saved myself from this depression and not wasted my money on a medication that ultimately made me SICKER. Just because we are ill doesn #8217;t mean we should be uninformed of a medication #8217;s side effects because it means it we may not take it. Smh. This opinion is, by my view, part of a very concerning and antiquated issue.

ALSO I got thoroughly and explicitly warned about the risks of taking Lithium were I to become pregnant but the negative side effects of Zyprexa on ME were kept from me... how is this right or fair. It seems to suggest the doctors care more about unborn fetuses than they do full grown women. Fuck that too! They should warn you about EVERYTHING. Not what they pick and choose. Absolute bullshit.

WRITING.TITLE: Do the nightmares ever go away?
WRITING.TEXT: I was a victim of abuse at the hands of my ex boyfriend. 2014-2015 then he went to prison for it but it happened again in 2018 upon his release from prison. He is back in prison now with false imprisonment and battery charges. The problem is, since this happening, I have nightmares all the time. I #8217;ll dream that he #8217;s standing over me with a knife or a gun while I #8217;m still in bed asleep. I #8217;ll also dream of me trying as hard as I can to get back into contact with him. I write hundreds of letters in my dreams and search every where for him. When I finally (in some of the dreams) find him, he is horribly mean. I myself up crying from most of these dreams and I #8217;m in a poor mood for the remainder of the day, sometimes multiple days after. My question is has anyone else experienced this? What if anything can I do? Will it ever stop?

I just came back from the store buying bandages. I don #8217;t ever buy blades. I just break apart my old shaving razors (and sanitize them) they cut a lot easier for whatever reason. Sometimes too easy.
